name: Griffin
description: A Hybrid monster commonly found in primeval highlands and unreachable mountain summits.
additionalInfo:
A winged hybrid combining the features of an eagle and a lion, known for its deadly swooping attacks.
Class: Hybrids,
Variations: Royal griffin, Archgriffin,
Occurrence: primeval highlands, unreachable mountain summits,
Loot: Griffin mutagen, Griffin's egg, Griffin feathers, Infused dust, Raw meat, Monster brain, Monster claw, Monster eye, Monster heart, Monster tongue
